description: Admiral Grotewohl`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1357 [Wagenseil], http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] and http://anidb.net/ch1360 [Kurlich] fleets.
name: Grotewohl
